verbs.description: So , Trump [V: has] discovered his version of the power of the pardon . Not in the traditional sense of righting wrongs on the basis of well - reasoned moral and ethical reasons . Rather , he ’s identified it as an easy , breezy way to not only threaten enemies , ...
